description: Oregon Grape-holly (Berberis aquifolium 'Orange flame') is an amazing ornamental shrub. It's eye-catching foliage and bright, orange-yellow flowers make it perfect for adding colour and variety to your landscape. It's evergreen, drought tolerant and ideal for banks and slopes to stop erosion. It's also tolerant to coastal conditions and air pollution, making it an easy choice for any garden. It produces tasty, blue fruits and is used in the management of various skin diseases. Not only is this hardy shrub attractive, but it's also edible and medicinal. Oregon Grape-holly is an ideal choice for adding beauty, interest and usefulness to your landscape.
